tool_description: An api for all your cites and zipcode validation needs
name: Cities and Zipcode
title: Cities and Zipcode

api_list.name: getZipCodeDetailsWithZipcode
api_list.description:
This is a GET request and it is used to "get" data from an endpoint. There is no request body for a GET request, but you can use query parameters to help specify the resource you want data on (e.g., in this request, we have `zipcode=`88430).

A successful GET response will have a `200 OK` status, and should include some kind of response body - for example, HTML web content or JSON data.

api_list.name: getCitiesWithKeyword
api_list.description:
This is a GET request and it is used to "get" data from an endpoint. There is no request body for a GET request, but you can use query parameters to help specify the resource you want data on (e.g., in this request, we have `keyword=new`).

A successful GET response will have a `200 OK` status, and should include some kind of response body - for example, HTML web content or JSON data.

api_list.name: getCitiesByState
api_list.description:
This is a GET request and it is used to "get" data from an endpoint. There is no request body for a GET request, but you can use query parameters to help specify the resource you want data on (e.g., in this request, we have `state=AL`).

A successful GET response will have a `200 OK` status, and should include some kind of response body - for example, HTML web content or JSON data.
